findings.title: Incorrect reward calculation algorithm
findings.description: In CrossStake contract, there is a problem with the way the staking rewards are calculated.

findings.title: Redundant codes
findings.description: CrossYield contract farmingTokenPutToWork function and farmingTokenBalance function is the same.

findings.title: User Award Mechanism
findings.description: When calculating the price of IOU, only the current number of farmingToken in CrossYield, Strategy and MasterChef are counted, not the current number of pending reward in MasterChef that has not been collected.
